title: Bitcoin Pulsar
author: Bitcoin Pulsar
content: I can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: It depends on each people criteria to choose the good exchange, most people usually search "good Bitcoin exchange in x country" in google and it's not surprising either Binance, eToro, Coinbase, Kraken and any other centralized exchanges will show in the first result. But since in Bitcoin world, we shouldn't trust anyone and learn how to verify yourself, it's not advisable to use centralized exchange.The better option is decentralized exchange e.g. Bisq or any other non custodial zero KYC P2P platform [1][1] https://kycnot.me/

comments.author: Vyeon11
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange. many markets where to buy bitcoins.like binance and coinbase.You don't need to bother, there are lots of articles on Google or videos on YouTubewhich provides information about the bitcoin buying and selling market,you only need to prepare your money and account bank to buy it.

comments.author: Bitcoin Pulsar
comments.created_time: January 26, 2023, 03:38:05 AMLast edit: January 27, 2023, 01:51:56 AM by mprep
comments.body: I want to tell a story- how I came to discover Bitcoin. 1. One day I went to Tokyo then all of a sudden I travelled to Hokkaido  Island.   While walking by the snow I met a wild bear.  The bear told me by sound language that I must not jump over the fence.  Then a man appeared to me.  He welcomed me to his hut.  He told me his name is Nakamoto Satoshi. He offered me food and lovely drink made of milk. After 7 or 8 years, I was in London having fun with student in the LSE.  There then came to me a beautiful girl name Toshi.  When I met Toshi, she was intruded to me by another Japanese girl name Shimona.  Who told me about Japanese culture and koi fish. Then I remember my friend Nakamoto Satoshi. 2. I came home thinking of my friend and I give a google search but found nothing about him. It was in 2007 May. then I found a page appeared called Bitcoin@Bitcoin a twitter page.  I saw that the account is created by Satoshi Nakamoto. 3. I read the page and I become interested to know about Bitcoin.  After few months latter, I found out that my friend Nakamoto Satoshi, who created the twitter account Bitcoin@Bitcoin and publishing the Bitcoin: A Peer-2-Peer Electronic Cash System   I contacted him by email. He replied and told me that he is now in London doing an experimentation on global social economic policy. 4. After two days latter, I went to South London to meet my friend Nakamoto Satoshi, who is now known as Bitcoin and Blockchain inventor Satoshi Nakamoto. A crucial question has arisen to many - who is Satoshi Nakamoto ?  Is he Japanese ?  How he came to the idea of Bitcoin and Blockchain ?   Where is he living now ?  so many many question.  In the year 2013 when the American scientist uploaded  a video called '' I think I Know Who is Satoshi Nakamoto !'' it has intrigued many people, there after so many story has published over the last 10 years. Now, no body knows who is Satoshi Nakamoto ?  I am the friend of Satoshi Nakamoto. Satoshi Nakamoto or Nakamoto Satoshi is a wild bear who used to lived in the island Hokkaido.  Now lives in London.  I know him more tan 22 years. [moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.created_time: January 26, 2023, 08:51:43 AMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 10:28:05 AM by Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange. You are correct, Bitcoin is likely to rise now and may hit 25k before the end of January. This morning the opening price of Bitcoin was around 23.200 on Binance exchange which is above its pivot point on day chart and next resistance is at 23,767 which is important to break before it can reaches 25K. I think Bitcoin will continue moving sideways until inflation report is announced on 31st January. Based on the trend of previous months, inflation is likely to decrease further, which would be positive for market.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Go with Bisq if you're not willing to submit AML/KYC documents. On the other hand, if you're fine with submitting such documents, go with whatever exchange is available in your locality(DYOR, of course; there are a lot of shitty local exchanges out there), or go with Binance.

comments.author: Henrobakkara
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange.   I know some people will still wait for Bitcoin to continue to gain in price before they even consider buying in because they fear it is still not time to buy. BTC was at $15k+ back in November and has gained +$7k from that time and some will say now is a good time to buy, well you are right and I also believe anytime is a good time depending on how long you are willing to hold but buying when the market is more bloody and fearful is better and with regards to Exchanges, also depends on what type of person you are, are you willing to do kyc or not? so DEXs and CEXs are there to choose from as @mk4 also mentioned.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:38:05 AMI want to tell a story- how I came to discover Bitcoin. 1. One day I went to Tokyo then all of a sudden I travelled to Hokkaido  Island.   While walking by the snow I met a wild bear.  The bear told me by sound language that I must not jump over the fence.  Then a man appeared to me.  He welcomed me to his hut.  He told me his name is Nakamoto Satoshi. He offered me food and lovely drink made of milk. After 7 or 8 years, I was in London having fun with student in the LSE.  .....4. After two days latter, I went to South London to meet my friend Nakamoto Satoshi, who is now known as Bitcoin and Blockchain inventor Satoshi Nakamoto. Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 04:29:08 AMNow, no body knows who is Satoshi Nakamoto ?  I am the friend of Satoshi Nakamoto. Satoshi Nakamoto or Nakamoto Satoshi is a wild bear who used to lived in the island Hokkaido.  Now lives in London.  I know him more tan 22 years. Nice try, but this sound like many of the hundreds of bullshit stories about Satoshi. April 1st is still some months away, can't you be patient enough? I suggest you use the skill to write up a fantasy novel. Maybe it could end up being one of those books in The New York Times Best Seller list and no, am not kidding

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange. You know some international exchanges are currently experiencing problems, whether internal or external, but everyone now has their own principles for buying, trade, invest and so on, trust will ask you to think about which exchange is worth using and buying Bitcoins.For me personally, definitely i will choose exchange in my locale.The reason:• I know the local exchange office.• I know several local exchange teams.• and for other reasons, such as legal entities and so on.Broadly speaking, each country has exchanges that officially operate in their respective territories, the decision is yours.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Is this investment advice? Or are you looking for a platform? Or is it a question about buying? Or do you tell others about the platform?To choose a “good” platform, there are criteria that make it good in your eyes and bad in the eyes of others, so good is a criterion that may not be valid for everyone.Some of the disadvantages of the platforms are advantages of others. For example, in the centralized exchange, you will enjoy privacy, full control over your currencies, choosing several ways to buy and sell, but in return you will find weak liquidity, slow execution of orders, and you may pay more fees.

[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]Good story OP, my curious mind wants to know- how many books or fantasy stories you have published yet? you can provide us with some more of your fantasy stories here. Send my regards to Nakamoto Satoshi in the next part of this story. Quote from: Husires on January 28, 2023, 09:08:55 PMIs this investment advice? Or are you looking for a platform? Or is it a question about buying? Or do you tell others about the platform?To choose a “good” platform, there are criteria that make it good in your eyes and bad in the eyes of others, so good is a criterion that may not be valid for everyone.Some of the disadvantages of the platforms are advantages of others. For example, in the centralized exchange, you will enjoy privacy, full control over your currencies, choosing several ways to buy and sell, but in return you will find weak liquidity, slow execution of orders, and you may pay more fees.Op made the thread to tell us a legendary story of how he met Satoshi and become friend with him   You should save your energy for another topic.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon.When most of people think like this, it is greedy time and it's not a good time to buy. Especially if you are buying to trade, speculate that Bitcoin will give good profit shortly, it is not good time to do this."Be fearful when others are greedy and be greedy when others are fearful". Have you ever read this motto? It's time to apply it.Oppositely if you're wanting to buy Bitcoin for your investment with a plan to get profit in 2024, 2025 or later years, yes you can buy it now without fear that it will be corrected 30% or more.Quoteit is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?Get some good ones from top of lists for spot tradings.▶️https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/▶️https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchangesIf you want non-KYC exchanges, let's find some from ▶️https://kycnot.me/If you want to have comparisons for taker, maker, withdrawal fees and Deposit methods, let's check this table▶️https://www.cryptowisser.com/exchanges/

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Are you teaching someone how to buy bitcoins? Then saying "don't worry you will find a good exchange", I think this is like stupidity because everyone who knows bitcoin, of course they have chosen the best exchange according to their own criteria and we all already know about how to buy bitcoin.I don't believe your nonsense about Satoshi Nakamoto's friend who is considered a wild bear and continues to live in London now, I don't believe the story you are telling. lol

comments.author: Bitcoin Pulsar
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on January 29, 2023, 08:41:47 AMAre you teaching someone how to buy bitcoins? Then saying "don't worry you will find a good exchange", I think this is like stupidity because everyone who knows bitcoin, of course they have chosen the best exchange according to their own criteria and we all already know about how to buy bitcoin.I don't believe your nonsense about Satoshi Nakamoto's friend who is considered a wild bear and continues to live in London now, I don't believe the story you are telling. lol # You are wrong, there are millions of people out there want buy some bitcoin but they do not know how to buy and from whom to buy. They do not have clues, which exchange is good. # you do not have to believe, story is a story, it might be a true story or it could be fiction or it could be both true and fiction. # you cannot judge the merit of the story correctly until you read the full story. I am willing to publish few chapter of the complete legendary story of the Nakamoto Satoshi the Lord of the Samurai tribes of Ainu, who invented Bitcoin and Blockchain technology to educate the bankers and governments' officials.  Satoshi is the Wild Bear. He is laughing, while I am responding to your reaction. Lola Bitcoin Bear !

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: What do you mean by "don't worry you will find a good exchange"? Do you know how many scam exchanges are out there? If a newbie follow your advice they will just look for any random crypto exchange to use and they will end up losing money, you need to give them options of safe exchanges they can use, this is a bad post point OP. You need to work on yourself, learn to create better topics and go into details, if you don't know what to talk about it's better to comment on ongoing discussions.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin Pulsar on January 26, 2023, 03:05:27 AMI can see that the Bitcoin will Rise Now soon. it is better to buy some more Bitcoin , thinking where to buy from ?don't worry you can find a good exchange. I will prefer bisq because it is the safest with Escrow and happens to be with no KYC thing. I feel comfortable when I use it is to buy btc. Though, Binance is good but is centralized which makes it not too good for me,if you want to use Binance,it is up to you. Decentralized system is the best with full assurance of safety.
